title: help me practice my English skills and I help you climb the ladder XD
body:
hi, guys, I'm an ex-challenger, and I main irelia
I want to practice oral English, so hit me up and let's roll

replies.body: me can help speak good english yes?

Add me up:
iAkeno


Only add me if you are willing to voice chat because teaching English over text is freaking difficult to do lol
Resisting urge to take this to the gutter.....
:( why r u so rude mate

Woah, this ain't no offence intended post dude. My sense of humor has a very broad category, I was merely referring to the opportunity of comical banter about the words chosen, not who about who said them.

I apologize if this was taken as a personal slug, that was not the intent. I am a 31yo full of Dad jokes and less mature than my 6yo son with my sense of humor.
I can help improve oral skills
